name: 4-Way Wizard
description:
Enter the Catastrophe Crypt!

You are the young apprentice of a great Elder Wizard. You've barely started on the basics before your master took off on a mysterious journey, never to be seen again.

Now after countless hours of practice, you can almost manage the four schools of magic, Square, Oval, Triangle, and Different Triangle, but they are hard to control without tying them to their respective compass points. Armed with your spells, you now head deep into the Catastrophe Crypt, the very one that your late master was lost to.

Can you brave the twisting labyrinth? Can you defeat the bizarre creatures? Will you ever fit that darned hat? Go forth, and find out!
